utterance_1.transcript: So if a photon is directed through a plane with two slits in it, and either slit is observed, it will not go through both slits.
utterance_1.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_3.transcript: However, if it's observed after it's left the plane, but before it hits its target, it will not have gone through both slits.
utterance_3.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_7.transcript: I just think it's a good idea for a t-shirt.
utterance_7.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_10.transcript: One across is Aegean, eight down is Nabokov, 26 across is MCM, 14 down is... Move your finger.
utterance_10.speaker: Leonard

utterance_11.transcript: Phylum, which makes 14 across, pot of prints.
utterance_11.speaker: Leonard

utterance_17.transcript: Um, is this the high IQ sperm bank?
utterance_17.speaker: Leonard

utterance_18.transcript: If you have to ask, maybe you shouldn't be here.
utterance_18.speaker: Receptionist

utterance_19.transcript: I think this is the place.
utterance_19.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_24.transcript: I'll just finish my crossword puzzle.
utterance_24.speaker: Receptionist

utterance_26.transcript: Leonard, I don't think I can do this.
utterance_26.speaker: Leonard

utterance_29.transcript: No, we are committing genetic fraud.
utterance_29.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_30.transcript: There's no guarantee that our sperm is going to generate high IQ offspring.
utterance_30.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_32.transcript: I have a sister with the same basic DNA mix who hosts us as at Fudruckers.
utterance_32.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_34.transcript: A little extra money to get fractional T1 bandwidth in the apartment.
utterance_34.speaker: Leonard

utterance_35.transcript: I know, and I do yearn for faster downloads.
utterance_35.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_36.transcript: There's some poor woman who's gonna pin her hopes on my sperm.
utterance_36.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_37.transcript: What if she winds up with a toddler who doesn't know if he should use an integral or a differential to solve for the area under a curve?
utterance_37.speaker: Sheldon

utterance_38.transcript: I'm sure she'll still love him.
utterance_38.speaker: Leonard

utterance_40.transcript: Well, what do you want to do?
utterance_40.speaker: Leonard

utterance_45.transcript: I've never been nicked on a proffer of sperm before.
utterance_45.speaker: Leonard
